overview: Bradfords Bakers is committed to ensuring that they have the least possible impact on the environment. Their policy has always been to continuously improve sourcing raw materials. They believe that suppliers are working with them. They always take a long term view on working with suppliers and aim to develop a mutually beneficial partnership. The production of their willow hampers comes from the villagers. The villages all work in co-operation with a larger central finishing factory which they supply with their part finished wicker products. They take pride on their baked goodies, exquisitely packed in food hampers.
